availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Clinton Jones True (MN fruit catcher (yes!) & Kentucky colonel 40th KY Inf USA & col 53rd KY Inf USA)

body.p: Washington County, Minnesota, fruit catcher and Kentucky soldier. New York native. Son of Caleb True and Mary True. Married to Adelia B. True. Father of Hellen L. True. Student in Racine County, Wisconsin, in 1850. Fruit catcher in Washington County, Minnesota, in 1860. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as colonel from June 18, 1863, to December 30, 1864. Served in the 53rd Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as colonel from April 17, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Wisconsin, Racine County, Rochester, p. 185B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Minnesota, Washington County, Stillwater, p. 509.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 459.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 435.
Democrat and Chronicle (Rochester, NY), May 9, 1889, p. 6.
